recipes.title: Veggie Stew
method: Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well.
Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid.
Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes.
Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Chicken Curry
method: Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions until golden.
Add diced chicken and cook until browned.
Add chopped tomatoes and curry powder, cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
method: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté chopped onion and garlic until golden.
Add minced beef and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato sauce, simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
method: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon fillets with olive oil and season with dill, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon on the grill, cook for 4-5 minutes each side.
Squeeze lemon over salmon before serving.

recipes.title: Pancakes
method: Mix flour, milk, eggs, and sugar in a bowl until smooth.
Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour batter into the pan, cook until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
method: Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion into bite-sized pieces.
Cube feta cheese and add to the vegetables.
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle oregano over the salad.
Toss gently to combine.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
method: Cook ground beef and chopped onion in a pan until browned.
Add cumin and paprika, cook for another 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture, shredded lettuce, and cheddar cheese.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.
